name: Crochet Textured Headband
description:
The Ivy crocheted textured headband is the perfect size and thickness to keep you warm and stylish any day. Made of an ultra soft mixture of wool and acrylic yarn and is available in 6 colors

The last picture shows the colors you can choose from in my wool/acrylic blend. Choose from the drop-down box to make your selection.

Please see shop announcements for current turnover time. Thanks!

Instructions for care: Hand wash in cold water and mild soap, and lay flat to dry.

Scarf is lovingly made in a smoke-free home.

Pattern from Treasured By Holly

name: Crocheted Stripe Beanie
description:
This crochet beanie is made with super soft yarn which is warm enough for the coldest of days; yet, so lightweight you'll hardly notice you have it on. 

The last picture shows the colors you can choose from in my wool/acrylic blend. Choose from the drop-down box to make your selection.

Please see shop announcements for current turnover time. Thanks!

description:
The Ivy Chunky Cowl scarf is a seamless infinity scarf offering a unique pattern that is versatile and oh so comfortable. Measuring approximately 26" circumference and 11" tall with lots of stretch it is a great add on for any outfit.

The last picture shows the colors you can choose from in my wool/acrylic blend. Choose from the drop-down box to make your selection.

Please see shop announcements for current turnover time. Thanks!

name: Small Crocheted Bow Clip - Custom Color
description:
***This bow clip is not in stock. It will be hand made after you order it.*** 

Nothing is as cute as a little bow and a crocheted one is like the icing on a cake. These adorable bows will look cute on anyone from your newborn to your older girls. Handmade out of natural fiber cotton imported from Europe it is sure to make a statement with any outfit.
 
Colors Available: 
White
Peach
Light Pink
Shocking Pink
Red
Bright Orange
Orange
Bright Yellow
Mustard
Army
Lime
Mint
Emerald
Light Turquoise
Shocking Blue
Navy
Bright Purple
Light Grey
Grey
Black
Brown

They are about 2 3/4" long and 2" tall but since they are all individuals that measurement varies with each one. All clips come partially lined with ribbon on a 45mm (1 Â¾") alligator clip with no slip grip. All ribbon ends have been heat sealed to prevent fraying.

Please remember that your bow clips are custom made, just for you. I make all of the items myself so please allow time for the creation.
 
I do take rush orders for an additional $10 *per* item. If you are interested in a Rush order, please contact me for the details.
 
Colors may differ due to dye lot and/or differences in your own monitor colors. 

Care instructions: Hand wash, lay flat to dry. 

Bows are lovingly made in a smoke-free home.

name: Baseball Newsboy Cap with Chunky Blanket 28"x18"
description:
What you get: One Baseball Newsboy Cap and one Chunky blanket 28"x18". **These items are not in stock. All items are handmade after order is complete. Check my policy page for currant turnaround time**

Available sizes:

Newborn
0-3 months

Crocheted with 2 strands of 100% acrylic yarn, the hat (shown in Cream and Burgandy) is warm and very practical. And makes for one cute photograph!!

The mini Chunky blanket (in Burgandy) is super soft and chunky. Measuring 28"x18" it is perfect for a little extra padding or to spice up that perfect photo!

Please remember that your hats are custom made, just for you. I make all of the hats myself so please allow time for the creation.
 
I do take rush orders for an additional $10 *per* hat. If you are interested in a Rush order, please contact me for the details.
 
Colors may differ due to dye lot and/or differences in your own monitor colors.
 
Hat is lovingly made in a smoke-free home.
 
Care instructions: Hand wash in cold water & lay flat to dry
 

Pattern from Treasured By Holly 

PHOTOGRAPHY:

The amazing photography is from Christina of Christina P Photography. Check out her work at www.christinapphotography.com

name: Rose Feathered Headband
description:
***This headband is not in stock. It will be hand made after you order it.*** 

This sweet feathered headband would be the perfect accessory for any occasion. The flower measures around 2", but since they are all individuals that measurement varies with each one.
 
Made out of 100% mercerized yarn and 1/8" skinny elastic these custom headbands will be made to fit standard head circumference for age of child unless exact measurements are provided in comments.
 
Sizes are: 
newborn-13 1/4" 
0-3 months-14" 
3-6 months-14 1/2" 
6-12 months-16" 
12 months-teen-17 1/2" 
Adult-18"

description:
***This headband is not in stock. It will be hand made after you order it.***
 
This sweet little trio of roses (shown in Bright Teal) would be the perfect accessory for any occasion. The center rose measures about 1 inch, but since they are all individuals that measurement varies with each one.
 
Made out of 100% mercerized yarn and 1/8" skinny elastic these custom headbands will be made to fit standard head circumference for age of child/adult unless exact measurements are provided in comments.

PHOTOGRAPHY:

The amazing photography is from Nicole of Forever by Nicole Photography. Check out her work at www.foreverbynicole.âcom

name: Rose Headband in Hot Pink
description:
***This headband is not in stock. It will be hand made after you order it.***
 
There is nothing like a rose to make anyone feel special. That is what I had in mind when I created this beautiful Rose Headband (shown in Hot Pink). From newborn to adult this soft rose is the perfect compliment to any outfit. Crocheted with highest quality mercalized cotton yarn.
 
The double strand of the headband joins at both tips for easy tying. Using it as a headband there is no need to untie each time; once tied, slip it on and off with ease. Because of the nature of the tied headband one size pretty much fits all, but to better customize there are two sizes available.
 
The flower measures around 2 1/4", but since they are all individuals that measurement varies with each one.
 
~Not the color for you...check out all the colors available. You're sure to find exactly what you need. Specify color choice during paypal checkout.
 
Please remember that your headbands are custom made, just for you. I make all of the items myself so please allow time for the creation.
 
I do take rush orders for an additional $10 *per* item. If you are interested in a Rush order, please contact me for the details.
 
Colors may differ due to dye lot and/or differences in your own monitor colors. 

Headbands are lovingly made in a smoke-free home. 

Care instructions: Hand wash, lay flat to dry. Reshape flower petals while damp.
